size.description: Use the size prop to change the size of the Avatar.
size.description_zh: Use the size prop to change the size of the Avatar.

icon.description: display an icon on top of the background.
icon.description_zh: display an icon on top of the background.

alt.description: Otherwise, a placeholder will be displayed with the initials of the alt prop, customizable in ui.avatar.placeholder.
alt.description_zh: Otherwise, a placeholder will be displayed with the initials of the alt prop, customizable in ui.avatar.placeholder.

chipColor.description: Use the chip-color, chip-text and chip-position props to display a chip on the Avatar.
chipColor.description_zh: Use the chip-color, chip-text and chip-position props to display a chip on the Avatar.

chipPosition.description: Use the chip-color, chip-text and chip-position props to display a chip on the Avatar.
chipPosition.description_zh: Use the chip-color, chip-text and chip-position props to display a chip on the Avatar.

chipText.description: Use the chip-color, chip-text and chip-position props to display a chip on the Avatar.
chipText.description_zh: Use the chip-color, chip-text and chip-position props to display a chip on the Avatar.
